definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
soldier/servant/to finish/to die/finally/at last/pawn in Chinese chess
to fight at the head of one's troops/(fig.) to take the lead

sentences.english: If he is petty and does not reward his men well, his men would not give their best.
sentences.chinese: 不獎賞士卒，士卒就不會在戰鬥中拼效力。

sentences.english: If he is petty and does not reward his men well, his men would not give their best.
sentences.chinese: 不獎賞士卒，士卒就不會在戰鬥中拼效力。

sentences.english: If troops have become attached to you, but discipline is not enforced, you cannot employ them either.
sentences.chinese: 士卒已經親附，如果紀律仍不執行，也不能用來作戰。

sentences.english: The pre-Qin period "army's official" means the officers at all levels above soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 先秦時期“軍吏”指士卒之上的各級軍官。

sentences.english: The reason why officers are not afraid of war is because of following commands.
sentences.chinese: 士卒之所以不怕打仗，在於服從命令。

sentences.english: No matter what you do, as a leader, must take the lead.
sentences.chinese: 不管做什麼事，作爲一名領導者，都必須身先士卒。

sentences.english: Writing letters to families should be forbidden, this is to break all troubles of life.
sentences.chinese: 禁絕士卒和親人通信，以斷絕他們思家的念頭。

sentences.english: Aries pushes the others aside to get to the door first.
sentences.chinese: 白羊座身先士卒，第一個闖進屋門。

sentences.english: When the soldiers are not disordered, discipline will be well maintained.
sentences.chinese: 士卒不混亂，紀律就嚴明瞭。

sentences.english: When a general is separated from his soldiers, they can be attacked.
sentences.chinese: 將領和士卒離散，軍中無大將時，可以攻擊。

sentences.english: In such circumstances, the enemy will be thrown into confusion and our fleeing soldiers will stop by themselves.
sentences.chinese: 這樣敵人就會混亂，我逃跑的士卒就會自動停止。

sentences.english: If the conditions of diminished awesomeness prevail, the people will not be victorious.
sentences.chinese: 缺少威信，就不能指揮士卒去戰勝敵人。

sentences.english: This time, lead the Yellow Emperor, to lead troops reached the Chiyou array.
sentences.chinese: 這次，黃帝身先士卒，帶兵殺入蚩尤陣中。

sentences.english: Abandoning armor and carrying minimal rations, this is to motivate the troops.
sentences.chinese: 捨棄笨重裝備，少帶糧食，以激發士卒死戰的決心。

sentences.english: Now they are mandating that Geico develop a commanding presence on mobile phones.
sentences.chinese: 現在他們正身先士卒地將Geico開拓到手機上。

sentences.english: We can also set out a few pawns, on our side of the river.
sentences.chinese: 我們也可以在我們的界河邊放上一些士卒。

definition: soldier/servant/to finish/to die/finally/at last/pawn in Chinese chess
